original_text: God is the one who saves us. Now, at the proper time, he has made his message clear. He has given his message to me so that I can tell it to people. That is what he has told me to do.
korean_text: 자기 때에 자기의 말씀을 전도로 나타내셨으니 이 전도는 우리 구주 하나님이 명하신 대로 내게 맡기신 것이라

sentences.original_text: God is the one who saves us
he has made his message clear
He has given his message to me
so that I can tell it to people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 사람들에게 그것을 전할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: That is what he has told me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그분이 내게 하라고 말씀하신 것입니다
